cab.content: PARAPHRASE TELEGRAM from the- Govern-or General of Now Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies, (Received Colonial Office 8.15 a-m.,25th Fobruary/20)With reference to your cipher telegram of January 22n..d with regard to the channel through which the correspondence of the various British members of the League of Nations with the Secretaaiat General should be conducted. All such communications to and from League should in the opinion of my Government $ass through the British Cabinet Secretariat as suggested in.your telegram.LIVERPOOL.
